content:
The Chewy Decision
Chewy didn't go viral, but still remains a viable longer term project.  We're strategizing how to do organic growth through automation. Chewy’s growth strategy will now be fully automated(this is not true yet, but looking to do that
We’re keeping it as a long-term project while focusing on AI implementation first.

 Quick Update on the Last Post & Thank You
The last post drove X reposts and X impressions—huge thanks to everyone who engaged.
Your feedback and conversations helped shape this experiment.
We’re pushing forward to make job searching AI-native.

One of the goals of this was to connect with experts. Through AI driven outreach, we were able to do that and have several calls lined up, one with a distinguished thought leader and entrepreneur in AI. (Alon didn't confirm I could use his example, so  want to keep that out for now.
